website_summaries.verdict: Adorable and quiet, this effective tabletop humidifier makes a sweet addition to any baby's nursery.
pros: Includes nightlight and essential oil diffuser
You adjust the intensity of the mist
cons: Whale design is only available in blue

customer_reviews.title: So quiet!
customer_reviews.text: It is really quiet. And it looks really cute. It is much better than my old humidifier. I like it for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Rayna

customer_reviews.title: Cute whale humidifier
customer_reviews.text: Been using ( suffering)a noisy humidifier for a long time. This cute whale working really QUIET! Like the material and outlook. Great mist power! Like it.
customer_reviews.author: Qiao

customer_reviews.title: Clean it well
customer_reviews.text: Great customer service. Be sure to clean the tank often and well to avoid mold
customer_reviews.author: Mariana

customer_reviews.title: Best humidifier I’ve used
customer_reviews.text: The best humidifier I’ve ever had... Have had many problems with humidifiers that had filters collecting tons of mold etc....Which caused me to continually replace filters which got very expensive. But this one is great. Just note that you need to do cleaning on a regular basis... And specifically on the “muffler”...You can see that part shown on page 7 in the instruction book. I actually found out that you can Snap it right out and soak it in vinegar water then use a Q-tip to wipe down each segment. I do that also to the nozzle... And then take a paper towel to clean in the tube between the nozzle and the muffler. Hopefully that helps... Enjoy Hydrated skin!!!!
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working within 2 months
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: BROKE WITHIN TWO MONTHS. NEITHER THE LIGHT NOR THE MIST IS WORKING; DO NOT BUY THIS IF YOU WANT A LONG TERM PRODUCT. WAY TOO EXPENSIVE FOR THE TERRIBLE QUALITY AND VERY HARD TO CLEAN AS WELL. It doesn’t produce loud sounds (except for some minor water noises, which I think is super soothing) and it looks cute. It also lasts quite long, I slept for around nine hours and when I woke up there were still water left. The night light is also very subtle, not too bright that I can’t fall asleep. I really loved this humidifier!
customer_reviews.author: Yilang L.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after two days
customer_reviews.text: It has been two days since I started using and it stopped working. First time it stopped working I somehow got it to work, but this is the second time and I can't get it to work again. I tried emptying, unplugging, turn the dials, but nothing seems to work. The light doesn't turn on either. I will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Mina Song

customer_reviews.title: Adorable, just not terribly effective
customer_reviews.text: Effectiveness- Well, not sure we are able to experience a huge difference but I adore how cute the whale is. I know it works, can clearly see the mist coming out of the spout but really no relief, air quality is the same. I’m basing this off of my previous Vick’s humidifier, was also a night light and from the first night of use there was an immediate difference in the air, breathing was effortless. Only problem with that one was it leaked, should’ve kept it anyway. Anyway, that’s my honest review.
customer_reviews.author: Kay V.

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: This humidifier is SUPER adorable, quiet, lasts a long time (a few nights when set to run at about 50%), and I love that I can add essential oil as well! My 21 month old was having a really bad cold and I ran this a few nights with the "fight it" essential oil. I really think it helped with her cough. Been using this for about 2 weeks now with no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: SKy

customer_reviews.title: Worked for few months and then stopped
customer_reviews.text: I loved it at first. It was working perfectly and was easier to clean than other humidifiers I have had previously. Unfortunately it just stopped working. The night light still works and the sound is still on but the air does not come out anymore. I wish they also had a manual on how to clean it. I wonder if cleaning it regularly (to get rid of the built in mold) is what made it stop working.
customer_reviews.author: Don Nzo

customer_reviews.title: Cute little humidifier
customer_reviews.text: Bought this humidifier for my son's room and it's so cute! Very easy to use and set up - and we love the night light feature. It's not too bright and offers the perfect glow for sneaking in to check on him. Only thing I don't like, is it has to be on pretty high to see the mist coming out and the tank is fairly small. Running it at night to keep up humidity levels, we have to refill it nightly.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica B Fry

customer_reviews.title: The best humidifier!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! I had, had a much more expensive brand humidifier that was the biggest pain to clean.. ended up growing some black mold in spots that were near impossible to get to. Not the case with this adorable humidifier. Its extremely easy to clean and is virtually silent! I love that it doubles as a night light as well. Won't go wrong with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Best you will ever find! And the price is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated to give a review because the more people buy this the cheaper they will build and I did a lot of research to buy this one and I was right. BEST ON THE MARKET!!!! we go through this like crazy but this is the one that doesn’t leak doesn’t break in a week or two doesn’t make noise doesn’t get my furniture wet. Trust me we have had all that with previous purchases!
customer_reviews.author: alberto

customer_reviews.title: Cute and high quality
customer_reviews.text: Great Humidifier! Runs for a long period of time before refilling, only have it on low/medium and will run for 2-3 days. Wide opening makes it easy to clean, and it’s super cute! You can also adjust the brightness on the light or have it off which is a nice feature. The light does not turn off when you turn of the humidifier- not a negative but just something to be aware of if you don’t want to hit an extra button but it is nice to just use as a nightlight when you don’t need the extra humidity. Over all it’s great and way better quality than I thought it would be due to the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jaymi

customer_reviews.title: Helps with stuffy noses
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase for our little one. Not only does he love looking at the light, but it also helps with his stuffy nose. It’s easy to fill & the tank seems to last quite a while. It’s pretty quiet, although you can definitely hear that it’s running. But I think that it just adds to the white noise that helps the babe sleep. This is definitely a nightly staple for our household.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Not just for babies!
customer_reviews.text: We love it! We bought it to replace our old crane humidifier that stopped working after 3 years of continued use. I like that it’s easier to clean and the materials used look more durable. My kids are about 4 and 6 years old and they still love the whale design so it’s not just for babies! Highly recommend this humidifier!
customer_reviews.author: keroleen

customer_reviews.title: Mildew smell
customer_reviews.text: Update: the customer service reaction to my review was thoughtful and generous and I’m very pleased with the outcome! I use it every night for my 14 mo son. It immediately began to smell like mildew and to prevent that you have to soak it in bleach water every week, which hasn’t made the smell go away. You also have to soak it in vinegar water every week to prevent scale buildup. It’s too high maintenance for me. I’m using a Vick’s one now that doesn’t have the mildew smell problem. I wish I had realized this before my return period was up so I could have returned it!
customer_reviews.author: Madelina

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I love this humidifier.. it’s 3 in one I can used a nightlight during the night specially I have baby and I usually put on the lampshade but not anymore . Using this humidifier I can used at light worry free stress free. Beside that I can put the essential oil witch I really love it.. I can used this humidifier whole night long.. I felt our room is not dry anymore ang really smell good Putting the essential oil.
customer_reviews.author: K.G

customer_reviews.title: Cute humidifier
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute humidifier! I bought it for my plants. :) The shape is super cute, and the nightlight is a nice touch. The mist it emits is perfect, and I like that it’s possible to use oils with it. I live in Socal so sometimes it’s so dry at night, I wake up with cracked lips. This has helped with that. Overall a fantastic purchase and I look forward to using it more when the air gets even drier.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Great product, very happy!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, very cute for a child’s room, and easy to use. I also like that you can adjust the brightness of the nightlight and it has the memory of the last setting. The biggest selling point for me was the large opening where you put the water in. I love that it’s wide enough to be able to get your hand in there with a cloth and really wipe it down. Many other humidifiers on the market don’t offer that.
customer_reviews.author: Omer Lahmany

customer_reviews.title: Adorable..
customer_reviews.text: I was on the search for a humidifier + diffuser for my little one while he was sick, and just happened to come across this one. I LOVE IT. Easy to operate. Easy to fill and clean. Runs quiet. Definitely diffuses and keeps the room humid. Just what I was looking for. And it definitely helped my son..
customer_reviews.author: Kimberlee

customer_reviews.title: Toddler loves the Whaaale that sprays
customer_reviews.text: I love that this humidifier is also an oil diffuser. I use the Frida Baby Breathe oil every night and it smells great and has no build up. I rinse it daily and it cleans super easily. I also love the whale shape because my 18-month-old thinks it’s funny and calls it the whaaaaaale. Like all humidifiers, it needs fresh water and does make a slight humming but my son likes the white noise. The night light is an added bonus that I don’t really use.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Sanderson

customer_reviews.title: Bought for newborn
customer_reviews.text: We bought this when we brought our newborn home - it has worked so well! I didnt realise what a difference a humidifier could make - even for my sinus issues! It is super cute, holds a lot of water and we have had no issues so far ( have used it every night since we got it a month ago). Recommend !
customer_reviews.author: Kate S

customer_reviews.title: quiet, last all night, gentle lightnight
customer_reviews.text: This is a very quiet humidifier and it is a breeze to clean with the brush it is provided in general. It has a gentle nightlight. My kids love helping to fill up the tank every night before bedtime and it lasts for the whole night. However there is one particular part where the steam comes out that the brush is unable to reach, thus the water stain accumulates over time. I am guessing using kid toothbrush might help, or if manufacturer can provide a tiny long brush to clean up that particular area it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Wang

customer_reviews.title: This works!
customer_reviews.text: I am 5 months pregnant, and my nose is constantly stuffy during the day. I bought this cute humidifier to use while I'm working from home (bonus, it matches the ocean decor we've chosen for our nursery!). Easy to set up and cleared my stuffy nose in about 1 hour. Happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Winter the heater would dry the air.We feel the nasal passages being so dry . I have been waking up in the middle of the Night.baby can’t sleep well. So I decided to buy a humidifier.This humidifier was very easy to set up and looks so cute. So quiet.I really like having this humidifier and I hope it lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: ann^_^

customer_reviews.title: Love love love love it!
customer_reviews.text: I will buy a second one for my son, bought it for my daughters room and love it so much, it’s quite, the lights isn’t too bright, perfect nightlight and perfect diffuser, great quality, worth every penny and the cutest accessory for any room!
customer_reviews.author: S.K.

customer_reviews.title: Very very cute & functional product
customer_reviews.text: This humidifier is everything for me now in night, when I go to sleep.I became obsess with it. This works so well. I just pour approximate 500ml water and turn on it. That’s it.Then it goes all the night even morning too. Very easy to use. It has very very little noise that you can barely hear it. And the light!!omg when you turn it on it looks soooo cute☺️. I have a 4moths old baby girl, I think she is getting use to of it like me😀
customer_reviews.author: Payel A.

customer_reviews.title: stopped working after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: We really liked this humidifier at first. Our son loved the night light. However, after barely any use and only 3 months after buying it, the humidifier just stopped working for no reason. Our son was pretty bummed out. We will be searching for a different humidifier with a night light.
customer_reviews.author: MKay

customer_reviews.title: Great humidifier
customer_reviews.text: I've originally purchased it for a baby room but we've been using it for about a week in our bedroom since baby is not here yet. I really like it! Cute design, has a night light, easy to use and perfect for a bedroom. I can finally breathe at night. Might have to purchase a second one now!
customer_reviews.author: Ekaterina

customer_reviews.title: Compact.
customer_reviews.text: Quiet sound , & very useful. My daughter has been really congested for the past week & meds didn’t seem to help.. I ordered this humidifier & within 1 day i can already see her getting slightly better. It works great, easy to use, and its not to big or ‘ bulky ‘.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: We have been using the humidifier for a month now without any complaints. It does everything we bought it for. Very nice aesthetics as well, our little guy loves the whale light at night. Overall, no complaints and just seems to be a great product. We are very happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Confirmed Purchase

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Pwrfect item, adjustable mist setting and a nightlight option. I love that its a cute little whale. Our house is always so dry and we would wake up with dry mouth and sore throats and now we dont. It also worked great when the baby was sick!!
customer_reviews.author: Faiths Wings- Crystal Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Best bedroom humidifier that I’ve found
customer_reviews.text: We love this little humidifier. It does an excellent job of providing much needed humidify in our bedroom during the sleeping hours. We’ve used it everyday, since we are living in the southwest US desert and it is very dry on our sinuses. We have seen a noticeable improvement in our sinuses. The machine is very quiet which is important as we are both very light sleepers. We’ve tried many brands and this is the most efficient and best value that we’ve found.
customer_reviews.author: Free-beaz

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and easy to fill and clean
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my 3 year old daughter’s bedroom. It has been used for about two weeks and it works great so far. Seting the highest level will need about 3/4 tank of water. It is very easy to fill in the water. I use hot tape water and there is no rust so far. The noise level is low.
customer_reviews.author: James2

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Humidifier for a Child's Room
customer_reviews.text: I bought this humidifier for my baby's room. It is so cute and doesn't make any noise at all. I love that it has a high and low setting and can run all night long. I also love the soft night light feature that it has...perfect for middle of the night feeding sessions. I love this humidifier!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best humidifier I could hope for!
customer_reviews.text: So simple and very cute! We have it cranked up all the way every night to keep my toddler and I's noses from getting dry and our lips from cracking so we have to fill it all the way up every night but it's so easy. It takes just a couple seconds and easily became part of our family's nighttime routine. Noiseless and the light is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Samira

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet/ water last for ever
customer_reviews.text: I have finally found the best humidifier. This one is super super quiet. The water in the tank lasts for days. I love how the mist is adjustable. A huge bonus is you can use essential oils in it. Most tell you not to. The night light function is a great feature and it is a very soft light. I will be buying another one for the living room.
customer_reviews.author: DRB

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, quiet, but might not be easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: This is my second humidifier. Compare to my first one, it is really quiet and great for sleeping. I love it with a knob that can adjust different amount of water. Even I’m really satisfied with this one, I’m still doubting the whale shape might not be easy to be cleaned.
customer_reviews.author: Fab T

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and quality humidifier
customer_reviews.text: This humidifier model does exactly what the description of this product claims. It's very quiet, aesthetically designed, easy to operate. A little difficult to clean though. To me, the fact that It is BPA-free was the most attractive factor. It means you can keep yourself from potentially hazardous chemicals. After using it, I could start breathing well again. It runs on high at least for 10 hours, so I can sleep with it turned on. Overall, I am happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUserSince2018

customer_reviews.title: Cute one!
customer_reviews.text: I like this small cute product. Barely you can hear any noise during night. The only question is that it may not big enough for a whole night when you turn on the maximum, but it will be stoped if the water level is low. Very easy to clean. I change the water everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce H.

customer_reviews.title: A quiet humidifier whisper
customer_reviews.text: He spoke softly and almost immediately began to emit cool steam. I leave my minerals overnight for the third night and moisturize just right. I had to put my tissue box in front of the power lamp because it was lit, but otherwise there was no complaint. LED lighting is very good. Good capacity of water tank and automatically shut down when water is used up. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Albright

customer_reviews.title: So cute and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Cute whale. Perfect for my son bedroom. But there always have pink mold inside after you use just for a couple day so you need to clean it often
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Quiet humidifier
customer_reviews.text: I’m using this humidifier in my bedroom and is noticing a difference. My morning nose bleeding seems to be less severe now. So far the humidifier has been very quiet when it’s operated, and won’t use up the tank of water over night (~8hrs).
customer_reviews.author: Howevertheonlywas

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful! Since it's safe for babies, it's safe and easy to use for anyone, adults included.
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this, I love that essential oils are able to be used together with this (not all humidifiers can), and it's just such a cute design. I like that you can adjust the light level, and sometimes I just use it as a night light by itself. Very easy to fill up, and the material is a nice, light and sturdy kind of plastic, I'm not scared at all about it falling apart or breaking upon normal pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Hill

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. A great humidifier- quiet and mis-sized. Super cute for a children's room because of the whale shape and soft night light. My son is very happy with this product, as am I.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Beckwith

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We love this humidifier. We bought the same one for my older kids and loved it so much we bought a second for my twins. It's easy to use and I love that you can change the brightness to the nightlight and in intensity of the mist.
customer_reviews.author: Cristen Bronkema

customer_reviews.title: Great Addition to Kid's Room
customer_reviews.text: I initially placed a regular humidifier to my toddler's room, who refuse to have it turn on because he was afraid of it and has no idea what it does. We saw this cute whale shaped humidifier and decided to give it a try, guess what? My toddler loves it! Not only does he love it, he asked for it to be turn on every night as part of his nightly pre-sleep ritual now. It is quite, and the wide opening of the water tank allows easy cleaning. The night light feature is an added bonus. Works great for a small size good. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: Super quiet!
customer_reviews.text: I had a dry throat and a blocked nose, so I did some research and it looked like I could do it with a humidifier because I needed more water. This one seemed ideal because it was in my price range and received high reviews. Setup is very easy. Remove the middle (main) unit from the bracket, unscrew the strainer and add water. Reposition on base, place removable nozzle on top, and open. It works instantly and doesn't make a sound, which is one of my main concerns. Once filled, it can last for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Fabrizio Guglielmo

customer_reviews.title: So cute and works great!
customer_reviews.text: So stinking cute! Came in less than a day and I love it! Expecting a baby in December 2020 and with how dry of a climate I live in this is going to be a savior for both myself and baby! Can’t wait to use the essential oils diffuser too!
customer_reviews.author: Analisa Becker

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome for baby! I put some lavender oil and water in it and it works perfect. Very quiet. The only thing is that it’s kind of big but we love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Says it blows warm mist but it doesn't
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't give warm mist like it says that's the only issue. But other than that it works great
customer_reviews.author: Sweetes

customer_reviews.title: For adults too
customer_reviews.text: I had a bad sinus issue and bought this for myself in my delirium. Didn't realize it was a whale and for a nursery. But it works very well and my grandchildren love the tail!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Quality
customer_reviews.text: We bought this humidifier for our baby and have been using it in our room before baby comes to test it out. Amazing. It has a light that dims if its too bright or you can turn it off. There is a minimum and maximum level knob to control the air flow. We use it with distilled water. You can fill about a gallon in there and it will last a few nights the machine is very easy to clean and up keep. We plan on buying one for each of our rooms! Also the cute whale design melts me!
customer_reviews.author: Maria M. K.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: It’s broken after using it for less than 2 mo😦 I called product support & they didn’t even have a manual on how to clean it😮😮 No bueno, waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Your Veda mama

customer_reviews.title: It was a whaley good find
customer_reviews.text: It's super easy to clean. You can add a few drops of oils into it. It's pretty quiet also. And who doesn't like random household objects shaped like cute things.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: BE CAREFUL
customer_reviews.text: I stopped using this problem because even I cleaned it every other day, it caused me serious breathing problems including severe shortness of breath.
customer_reviews.author: Apple S

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the new humidifier for my daughter. There’s no noise, easy to clean and operate. This product has a built in night light which my daughters loves. I also purchased some essential oils that promote sleep for kids. This product is a good investment if you have kids that go to daycare.
customer_reviews.author: brandon

customer_reviews.title: Nice humidifier
customer_reviews.text: Quiet with an excellent switch for adjusting the setting for humidity level production. Easy handling and easy to clean. Nice night light option. We got two! One in the shape of a whale for our toddler room :)
customer_reviews.author: Violin MD

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted a cool mist humidifier for my daughter who was sick a lot this winter. I couldn’t have asked for a better quality, quiet cuter humidifier and it allows you to put in essential oils. I’m actually never buying another humidifier. Buy this today!!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy J. Mccoy

customer_reviews.title: Great for moms and kids
customer_reviews.text: I am a new mom and I have to wake up several times at night to breastfeed my newborn. It was so inconvenient without a night light so I searched online and happened to see this cute little whale humidifier. I wasn't going to buy a humidifier but since winter is coming and my newborn gets dry very often so I bought this product. I am glad that it works so well for me, because it also has a soft light function. It's fairly easy to use and clean. Really good for night time breast feeding!
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: cute
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a humidifier to help combat dry skin and chapped lips while I slept and this has certainly done the job. Great quality at a reasonable price, and very easy to set up and operate. and it‘s look very very cute,so I love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: chen

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an experiment in my son's room. He was five years old and often had colds and sulks. The product is much larger than I expected (I should have read the size!). But it's as good as a night light. He seems to sleep better, and I haven't had any experience with noise or leaks. The "steam" is cool, so there is no risk of burns - I hope they have a smaller version of the product for my daughter's room. Overall, great!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Massengill

customer_reviews.title: The answer!!
customer_reviews.text: Me my baby and my girlfriend sleep waaaay better just please make sure to clean often. Humidifiers will be great as long as you clean them all the time!!
customer_reviews.author: Francis La Torre

customer_reviews.title: Get it!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s extremely quite! The night light comes in handy for late night feedings, and the cute whale shape is just a cherry on top. Absolutely loving this product
customer_reviews.author: MandaMichelle

customer_reviews.title: very quiet and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: The cutest humidifier I've seen, and it is easy to reach in and clean. I don't even hear it!
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: Excellent humidifier!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this to help with dry weather during winter, and use it in our bedroom. It is indeed an excellent choice, and works well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Mr & Mrs Martin

customer_reviews.title: Cute and quiet!
customer_reviews.text: I love this humidifier for my newborn. The nightlight on it is perfect for changing him in the middle of the night and jt is very quiet. I like that I do not have to refill it every few hours. The design is cute and the quality is great. I have not yet tried oils in it. I would highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: victor weil

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my baby’s room. Lots of capacity for water. Enough to go two nights. Adjustable humidifier. Light could have been adjustable too. It’s too dim. No noise, which I like the best
customer_reviews.author: Seattleites

customer_reviews.title: Good Humidifier with Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and clean! Great product I like it. It can be adjusted and the light can be turn on or off, which is very convenient! Recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Jack W Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Safety
customer_reviews.text: This humidifier is very good, much better than my other humidifier. Very quiet, can be used for three days when filled with water, easy to clean, the light is very soft and not dazzling, children can operate.we love it.
customer_reviews.author: Xiao Li

customer_reviews.title: Love this humidifier
customer_reviews.text: This humidifier is compact and quiet. Perfect for the baby room. Also the light is dimmable which provide perfect lighting source.
customer_reviews.author: P Lai

customer_reviews.title: Good product and customer service
customer_reviews.text: After having a trouble with a light , a customer service of this company had contacted me and sent me a new replacement. Totally happy with their product and customer service You will not disappointed when buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ngoc Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Good capacity
customer_reviews.text: This humidifier looks cute! I buy it because of its design. After I received, I found it helped increase the humidity of my room a lot. And I don’t need to change water too many times. It has saved my winter in North America.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and use
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it yesterday afternoon and it arrived first thing this morning. This is the simplest filling and setting, and it immediately begins to eject steam. I got my son and myself because we had asthma, and the dry air made us cough and gasp. Since this morning, we have hardly coughed and our breathing has become much easier. This is a very good product for price.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES  ADAMS

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working
customer_reviews.text: We liked it at first but stopped working about a month of use. The light goes on but no vapors. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Alon

customer_reviews.title: Supervalue humidifier
customer_reviews.text: I bought a humidifier to help me relax with aromatherapy oils at night. The effect is very good, I left a deep impression. Simple to use - add water to add a few drops of aroma, aroma can last a long time. I like the built-in night light. The soft light was very calm. The important thing is that night use is important to me. The size is very good - if set to low, it lasts for 7 hours overnight. The
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes Shields

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Humidifier.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Humidifier for daughters room. It is easy to fill and clean and the light is extra added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Serena Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: WORKS PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this humidifier for my newborn's room. She had RVS and the Dr. recommended to have a humidifier on throughout out the night to help her congestion. This humidifier worked great lasted all night and it is very user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Finally!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent humidifier for my son's bed room. Super quiet, perfect lighting, easy to use and clean! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Javier Jay Cavazos

customer_reviews.title: Humidifier
customer_reviews.text: Edit: Customer service contacted me and gave me a refund after my initial review. So helpful! Extra stars for service. I loved this humidifier, but I bought it in February and it stopped working only a month later. Not sure why.
customer_reviews.author: Tacy Barker

customer_reviews.title: Cute design and works well
customer_reviews.text: Cute design, very well made, and easy to clean. I've used it for a couple nights, and it has not leaked so far.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: I love this!
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad we got this. Easy to clean and use. Has pretty powerful steam options for being smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Mel B

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: A perfect product! No noise in the night. I put it on the cardboard and the cardboard didn’t get wet! You can turn on the soft light during night. Very convenient. I love it and strongly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Edison H

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased to replace a Vicks humidifier and it seems to produce a better result by comparison 🌟
customer_reviews.author: Kazzie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean easy to use perfect item
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet just right for baby room. very easy to clean with wide open and easily detachable compartments
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Love my new whale humidifier!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new humidifier! The design is cute, technology quiet, and the night light a savings grace!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and effective
customer_reviews.text: What an adorable humidifier! It's shaped like a tall whale. Most amazingly, it's really quiet and works well. I feel it much easier to survive this dry winter with this humidifier. My skin is no longer as dry as a few days ago. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Persson

customer_reviews.title: User friendly
customer_reviews.text: So far, it's been great. I was also pleasantly surprised today when I was cleaning it. I went to dump the water from the base and was looking to see which side would be the best to avoid any watering entering outlets, etc. and it literally answered my thoughts. There was an arrow pointing to the edge and it said "Drain Side." I also really like the night light feature.
customer_reviews.author: Pax Anne

customer_reviews.title: So cute and great for the winter
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet so cute. Make sure to run vinegar through it once a week if you have hard water.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah H

customer_reviews.title: Finally!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a good humidifier for my baby since he was born. This is perfect and so adorable! I love that you have the option to turn the light on or off!
customer_reviews.author: TTEwing

customer_reviews.title: Cute, quiet, and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: This is a great humidifier for my baby's room. It is easy to clean, quiet, and looks very cute!
customer_reviews.author: C. Oldham

customer_reviews.title: High quality humidifier
customer_reviews.text: Great quality at great price. So quiet I don't even know it's on. No more bloody noses this winter.
customer_reviews.author: Gogojeep

customer_reviews.title: Love the humidifier!
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says. I use it in my kids room and it has worked well so far. I wish the tank was a little bigger to hold more water but other than that, it's a great humidifier. Cleaning is a little difficult to get in the little spots but still doable.
customer_reviews.author: Dhara

customer_reviews.title: Great breathing addition to kids nursery/ room
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to our son's nursery and the filtered mist really blows out. Quiet yet durable operation. No leaks, but thin towel underneath just as precautionary. In about a week of continuous use our son's congestion in his chest and nose had began to clear significantly. Also has built in night light! Adorable
customer_reviews.author: SLHines

customer_reviews.title: Really good product !!
customer_reviews.text: Cute design. I like the feature auto off when run out of water. If you use Essential Oil, you should use a really light amount of it. Around 3 drop is enough for 200 sqft. Run quietly for bed room
customer_reviews.author: Loc Ha

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: We use it every day and it helps a lot! Love the design and the quiet sound.
customer_reviews.author: Fye

customer_reviews.title: Super cute humidifier for small bedroom use
customer_reviews.text: High quality product that works well and is super quiet. There is a nightlight available if you choose to use it. LOVE the whale shape. Not going to lie, using this in my own room (not a baby's room) . :) . My plants love it too!
customer_reviews.author: KBtoTheA

customer_reviews.title: This is a reliable humidifier that delivers.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking to buy a humidifier and came across this one by chance. At first I was hesitant because of the price was more than I wanted to spend but in the end it was well worth the price. It is adorable and works really well! I am very pleased with my purchase. The humidfier is super quiet, made of quality material, works as a nightlight, and lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Humidifier
customer_reviews.text: We received this humidifier in a timely manner. The instructions made me a little paranoid regarding fire hazards, but I believe they are standard for all humidifiers (unplug if you aren't going to be using for a long period of time/empty/etc). It is seemingly easy to clean and is cute for a nursery. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Cook

customer_reviews.title: I love the design
customer_reviews.text: I buy it because it looks so cute. I live in NYC, and it is so dry here. This humidifier is not only looks cute, but also works great and easy to use. I am happy with this purchase, and consider to purchase an extra for my girlfriend.
customer_reviews.author: David Chen

product_meta.title: TaoTronics Humidifiers for Babies, 3-in-1 Humidifier with Essential Oil Diffuser and Night Light, 2.5L Cool Mist Humidifier for Bedroom, BPA-Free, 26dB Whisper Quiet, Easy to Clean, Auto Shut Off
product_meta.description: Color:BlueTaoTronics - Enhance Your Life TaoTronics, a flagship brand under the Sunvalley group, is dedicated to providing superior-quality, reasonably priced electronic products that improve the lives of our customers. We strive to develop, innovate and focus on utilizing the latest technology with easy-to-use devices. Technical Specifications: Voltage: DC 24V 1A Power: 18W Working Time: 12-30Hrs Water Capacity: 2. 5L/ 0. 66Gallon Mist Output: 60-160ml/h Mist Height: ＞50cm Noise: 26dB Room Size: 10-25 m / 107-269 ft Product Dimensions: 8. 86 x 5. 98 x 8. 43in What’s in the Box: 1 x TaoTronics 3-in-1 Humidifier 1 x Cleaning Brush 1 x Thank You Card 1 x User Guide
feature_bullets: ADORABLE TABLETOP HUMIDIFIER: This whale shaped humidifier with 2.5L tank provides 30hrs of continuous mist; made of BPA-free material, it is safe & healthy for babies and pregnant moms.

QUIET HUMIDIFIERS: Patented noise reduction technology humidifies the air at just 26dB without beeping, fan running, or water dripping sounds, perfect humidifier for bedroom, baby, nursery and nightstand.

3-in-1 HUMIDIFIER: A trinity of calming features, use as a cool mist humidifier to fill the air with lavish hydration, an essential oil diffuser to add refreshing scents, and as a soothing night light for bedroom.
SOFT NIGHT LIGHT: Press and hold the night light button to create a gentle glow and smoothly adjust the night light, perfect for night time breastfeeding and to help babies get a restful sleep.

FRAGRANCE DIFFUSER: Anti-corrosive PP material ensures you can add essential oils to the humidifier to fill your space with an aromatherapy ambience; the humidifier also auto shuts off when the water level is low.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars779 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Warranty Description: Taotronics humidifier comes with 30-days money back without reason and 12-month warranty. If you have any questions, please contact us and we will respond within 24 hours. Our customer service team by support@taotronics. Com.
